'''1.17 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.17-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.17]], released on June 4, 2021,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-17-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.17 Release Candidate 1|June 4, 2021}}</ref> which fixes bugs and crashes.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.17 Release Candidate 1|otherissuescount=2
|;previous
|227323|Custom player heads sometimes flash when placed on armor stands.
}}
'''Other'''
* Improved desync issues when exiting a boat over a high latency connection.
* Fixed crashes.{{more info}}</onlyinclude>
